roleset.name: question a witness (as if) after the opposition
roleset.note: CROSSEXAMINE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on instance in ULA. (from crossexamine.01-v)

example.name: corpus example
example.text: They refuse to testify at a deposition , and my suggestion to them was that if we were capable of resolving something as a result of this conference , that they would then attend a deposition , because I believe [the defendants]-1 would have a right *trace*-1 to cross-examine them or otherwise examine them prior to them taking the stand .
example.arg: prior to them taking the stand

example.name: passive with topic
example.text: [Kevan Walsh, ESR scientist,]-1 will be cross examined *trace*-1 on his claim Robin Bain shot from more than 20cm away
example.arg: on his claim Robin Bain shot from more than 20cm away

example.name: passive with predicate
example.text: Last week I-1 was cross-examined *trace*-1 as an expert witness in a software litigation case in Utah.
example.arg: in a software litigation case in Utah
